Posts.Content: Apr 22, 2009 01:39AM Reen517 wrote: Hello all: I can tell you first hand that losing weight definitely has a possitive affect on lymphadema. I lost 40 lbs over only a couple month time. My lymphadema was out of control until I lost the weight. Now I hardly have any problems with it swelling up at all.  I also wear the sleeve and that also helps. Hope this helps.  Hugs, Reen
Posts.Title: Weight Loss & Exercise ck55 NatsFan
